summary: Adds a nice, cosy little hovel between The Guardian Stones and Helgen. (Awesome spot for new characters and roleplaying hunters)
descriptionHtml:
[COLOR=GOLD][SIZE=8]v0.9[/SIZE][/COLOR]


[SIZE=6][COLOR=Grey]?[/COLOR][COLOR=Gold]Introduction[/COLOR][COLOR=Grey]?[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=3]Adds a cosy hovel between The Guardian Stones and Helgen(that means being close to Riverwood to sell and buy supplies).
Awesome for roleplaying hunters and lone wolves. I highly recommend to use this mod with this one: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7800 --- as it will make your roleplaying experience even better.[/SIZE]

[COLOR=Gold]
[SIZE=6]Features:[/SIZE]
[/COLOR]
[SIZE=3]-An awesome hovel on a cool spot
-A woodchopping block
-A respawning sack of salt and a cooking pot for extreme roleplaying and cooking (no need for a hunter to have potions!)
-A storage chest(safe, doesn\'t respawn)
-A nice and furnished interior!(with pelts hanging on the walls of course, you\'re a hunter!)
-A book to help you kill horkers! :D
-Basic needs for a low-level person willing to be a hunter (knife, hunting bow, meat to begin your journey)[/SIZE]
[COLOR=Gold]
[SIZE=6]v0.9[/SIZE]
[/COLOR]
[SIZE=3]-Bloody table with all of your meat ready to be cooked!(ew!It\'s outside from v0.9)
-A hunting dagger(basically an iron dagger with a bit higher stats, supports roleplaying if you want to have a decent dagger but don\'t want a dwarven or ebony one)
-A note from Adrianne
-Bugfixes like the random bookshelf in the floor or the cheese wheel that gets pushed off the dining table because of colliding with the plate[/SIZE]


[COLOR=Gold]
[SIZE=6]Installation[/SIZE]
[/COLOR]
[SIZE=3]Copy \"Warmunth.esp\" into your Skyrim/Data folder.[/SIZE]

[COLOR=Gold]
[SIZE=6]Uninstallation[/SIZE]
[/COLOR]
[SIZE=3]Remove \"Warmunth.esp\" from your Skyrim/Data folder.[/SIZE]

[COLOR=Gold]
[SIZE=6]Plans:[/SIZE]
[/COLOR]
[SIZE=3]Add some wild animals close to the location for comfortable hunting
Make an alchemists shack or something similar(thanks interim)
Add a small garden(thanks canodab)
??? - you decide in the comments[/SIZE]
author: Yetu
